attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For 3 centuries Britannia has been on our currency and now in a blink of an eye she will be gone. We must not let this happen!!!!

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/50pence/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
